Data Formats for In-band OAM Data Formats for In-band OAM
draft-brockners-inband-oam-data-00 draft-brockners-inband-oam-data-01
Abstract Abstract
In-band operation, administration and maintenance (OAM) records In-band operation, administration and maintenance (OAM) records
operational and telemetry information in the packet while the packet operational and telemetry information in the packet while the packet
traverses a path between two points in the network. This document traverses a path between two points in the network. This document
discusses the data types and data formats for in-band OAM data discusses the data types and data formats for in-band OAM data
records. In-band OAM data records can be embedded into a variety of records. In-band OAM data records can be embedded into a variety of
transports such as NSH, Segment Routing, VXLAN-GPE, native IPv6 (via transports such as NSH, Segment Routing, VXLAN-GPE, native IPv6 (via
extension header), or IPv4. In-band OAM is to complement current extension header), or IPv4. In-band OAM is to complement current
